title: A critical Error Has Occured
body:
A Critical Error Has Occurred And the Process must be terminated 

This Is usually due to the result of incompatible third party software being installed on your machine 

Please disable and overlay streaming or experience enhancement softer additionally you may need to whitelist this application with your installed security software if you need further assistance please visit the support website

This message keeps appearing and kicking me outta my games every after about a minute or so I dont know how to fix it Attached Below Are My Logs And a picture of the error as far as i know the only third party software that could be doing this is Discord (i hope its not) other than that i dont have anything else installed.  

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/340851465386065920/506085948254191616/unknown.png
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1q2kkNmA8t_nI40jP7z7jhKxDF5CWqWFr
